document_data.caption: A map showing Rottesheim in Norheim.
document_data.name: Rottesheim
document_data.mainbody: '''Rottesheim''' was a [[Northlander]] settlement on an unnamed island in [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Rottesheim was the northernmost settlement found within Norheim. The village was located on the southern end of the island on [[Northwind Strait]].
